message: I tend to agree... especially the carousel, for a while it was the UX equivalent of this: http://www.clipartheaven.com/clipart/hands/handshake_06.gif

I'm sort of curious about the talk going on now where they're taking down "pattern libraries." For a while, we really wanted to catalog all of the patterns that we use frequently... but the word out there is "Pattern library - the clip art equivalent for the interaction design world"
For everyone that can't be there, check out Dan's baby hashparty to get the scoop on what's happening out in Boulder... http://hashparty.com/hashtag/ixd11
@yesbailey Huh. Interaction clip art. Guess it was bound to happen. Wo, does that mean we get to join the world of typesetters, illustrators and photographers?
